H1.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Numbers

H2.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Deuteronomy

H3.text: where are the 10 plagues found in the bible. Exodus

A4.text: God curses the Egyptians with ten terrible plagues, such as a river of blood, an outbreak of frogs, and the thick darkness.

A5.text: The 10th plague comes that night, causing the death of all Egyptian firstborn sons and prompting Pharaoh to expel the Israelites.
